bin_length.description: Size of bins (in bp) for coverage collection. Typically, this is set to 0 for capture samples. This must be the same value used for all case samples.
bin_length.title: Bin Length

do_explicit_gc_correction.description: If true, perform explicit GC-bias correction when creating PoN and in subsequent denoising of case samples. If false, rely on PCA-based denoising to correct for GC bias.
do_explicit_gc_correction.title: Do Explicit GC Correction

intervals.description: Picard or GATK-style interval list. For WGS, this should typically only include the autosomal chromosomes.
intervals.title: Intervals

normal_bams.description: This list must correspond to normal_bais. For example, 'Sample1.bam, Sample2.bam'
normal_bams.title: List of BAM files

padding.description: Amount of padding (in bp) to add to both sides of targets for WES coverage collection. This must be the same value used for all case samples.
padding.title: Padding

pon_entity_id.title: Name of the final PoN file

ref_fasta_dict.title: Path to reference fasta dict file

ref_fasta_fai.title: Path to reference fasta fai file
